ValidationRule.description: This validation rule restricts the CSR to change the Status to New From any other Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED(Status), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Open'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Identity Verified'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Data Request Processed'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Pending'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'On-Hold'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Resolved'), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),'Closed') ), ISPICKVAL(Status, "New"), NOT(ISBLANK(csmrgp__Merged_Date_Time__c )), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "PVHIntegrationAPIUser" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are unable to manually mark this ticket as New. Please set to the proper status.
